actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to relieve General Educational Fund, Inc., of Burlington, Vermont, of liability for certain taxes assessed under section 4945 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Relieves a named corporation of liability for certain taxes assessed over a specified period of time.

titles.title: A bill to relieve General Educational Fund, Inc., of Burlington, Vermont, of liability for certain taxes assessed under section 4945 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
